definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: T2 rotary awl cover is a kind of structural member that has been applied extensively.
sentences.chinese: T2銅材迴轉錐型罩是一種被廣泛應用的結構件。

sentences.english: Symbol for simulations of gyrator is built by SPICE languages.
sentences.chinese: 建立了用SPICE語言描述的迴轉器仿真模型。

sentences.english: The beam motion is divided into two parts: rigid rotation and flexible vibration.
sentences.chinese: 假設梁的運動由剛性迴轉與柔性振動兩部分組成。

sentences.english: The slewing mechanism consists of hydraulic motor and worm speed reducer.
sentences.chinese: 迴轉機構由液壓馬達及蝸輪蝸桿減速器組成。

sentences.english: Further, the end of the bristle curving portion is fixed on the brush substrate.
sentences.chinese: 進一步，所述刷毛迴轉部分端頭固定於刷板。

sentences.english: Double lower shapes, 180 degrees turning, lower shape rise to press, and with high efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 雙下模，180度迴轉，下模上頂加壓，工作效率高。

sentences.english: According to the operation and check for one and half years, such gyroscopic support is good in performance.
sentences.chinese: 改造後經一年半的運行檢驗，迴轉支承性能良好。

sentences.english: This quality can be use successfully in the entire zone of cement rotary kilns.
sentences.chinese: 該產品可成功地運用於水泥迴轉窯的整個鹼性區域。

sentences.english: The main grating fix up in the gyre axis.
sentences.chinese: 主軸線迴轉的光柵修理起來。

sentences.english: The ejection - port cover rolled shut and there was a feeling like being shot from a cannon .
sentences.chinese: 彈射口蓋板迴轉關閉，之後就有種炮彈出膛的感覺。

sentences.english: Orpheus froze in place, but he didn't turn around.
sentences.chinese: 俄耳甫斯徑直就僵在了那裏，但他並沒有迴轉身。

sentences.english: MANEUVERABILITY. Unique design with 3-wheel turning radius.
sentences.chinese: 輪迴轉半徑的獨特設計。

sentences.english: Loosens rotates boom's stopping nut, promotes the hopper changes to the next working procedure.
sentences.chinese: 鬆開迴轉叉架的鎖緊螺母，將料斗推出轉到下一工序。

sentences.english: After all, who doesn't whizz round blind corners on the wrong side of the road from time to time?
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，誰不會時不時地在盲角疾馳着打個迴轉彎呢？

sentences.english: Mr Bush's first U-turn was on Iran.
sentences.chinese: 布什先生的第一個迴轉在伊朗。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an adjustable electro-hydraulic turning gear which belongs to the technical field of hydraulic control.
sentences.chinese: 可調式電液迴轉器，屬於液壓控制技術領域。

definition: the back door/fig. under the counter (indirect way for influence or pressure)/anus
Shimen or Shihmen township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
to close down (temporarily or permanently)/to go out of business
The Surging Waves Pavillion in Suzhou, Jiangsu
lit. bashing sideways and colliding straight on (idiom); to push through shoving and bumping/to barge/to charge around violently
